title: Announcement: Permanent Server Shutdown
body:
We would like to inform all our valued users and artists that we are no longer associated with Lyrical Chord. While the previous platform has reached its conclusion, your continued love, trust, and support have inspired us to move forward with a new and improved approach.

We are excited to share that our journey continues with a fresh vision and a renewed commitment to creativity. However, as we build and refine this new system, it may take some time to operate at full capacity. We kindly ask for your patience as we work to deliver an even better experience.

Our new app is called Versefy — where verse meets chords. Versefy represents a new chapter, shaped by your belief in us and driven by our passion to create meaningful tools for artists and music lovers.

Thank you for standing with us. Your trust continues to guide our evolution.

— Team Vajra Studio
